definitions: an official who checks people or bags in order to ascertain whether they should be admitted to an area, especially at an airport

examples.text: screeners in protective gear are greeting folk at the doors
a screener noticed a suspicious item while X-raying baggage

shortDefinitions: official who checks people or bags

definitions: a copy of a new film or television program that is made available before its full release

examples.text: I was able to get screeners of season 1
they neglected to provide critics with screeners of the pilot

shortDefinitions: copy of new film or television programme

definitions: (in basketball, American football, and ice hockey) a player who obstructs or blocks an opponent or their view of play.
shortDefinitions: player who obstructs or blocks an opponent
